timezoneWarning.title: Timezone Changed
timezoneWarning.detected: We've detected your timezone has changed from {savedTimezone} to {currentTimezone}.
timezoneWarning.explanation: Your scheduled letter deliveries will still arrive at the same local time you originally selected, but this will be a different time in your new timezone.

dstTooltip.title: About Daylight Saving Time
dstTooltip.explanation: If you schedule a letter during DST (Daylight Saving Time), it will be delivered at the same local time you selected, even if DST has ended.
dstTooltip.example: Example: A letter scheduled for 9:00 AM PDT will arrive at 9:00 AM PST if DST has ended.
dstTooltip.tip: Times adjust to your current timezone

resumeDraftBanner.title: Continue where you left off?
resumeDraftBanner.description: We found a saved draft from your last visit.

categories.permanent: This error cannot be automatically fixed
